channel.title: Comments on: The Irrationality of Rationing

item.title: By: milf

item.description:

The Irrationality of Rationing | Messy Matters

item.title: By: Daniel Reeves
item.dc:creator: Daniel Reeves
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/gas/#comment-178224">Amy Kohtz</a>.
Nice catch! You just won $20!
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Amy Kohtz.

Nice catch! You just won $20!

item.title: By: Amy Kohtz
item.dc:creator: Amy Kohtz
item.description: "Barrred" should be spelled "barred". That may be the last of 'em.
item.content:encoded: “Barrred” should be spelled “barred”. That may be the last of ’em.

item.title: By: Daniel Reeves
item.dc:creator: Daniel Reeves
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/gas/#comment-172989">Thomas Powell</a>.
Nice catch! Just email me at dreeves@beeminder.com and I'll paypal it or chirpify it or wepay it or whatever you prefer.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Thomas Powell.

Nice catch! Just email me at dreeves@beeminder.com and I’ll paypal it or chirpify it or wepay it or whatever you prefer.

item.title: By: Thomas Powell
item.dc:creator: Thomas Powell
item.description: I think the paper is by Metzger and Goldfarb not "Goldfarband". How do I claim my $20? :D
item.content:encoded: I think the paper is by Metzger and Goldfarb not “Goldfarband”. How do I claim my $20? :D

item.title: By: Daniel Reeves
item.dc:creator: Daniel Reeves
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/gas/#comment-172927">Ezra Bradford</a>.
Eep, $20 to Ezra!
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Ezra Bradford.

Eep, $20 to Ezra!

item.title: By: Ezra Bradford
item.dc:creator: Ezra Bradford
item.description:
I think you meant "a dearth of similar past events", unless you meant some sort of benefit concert with a London band.
Not a typo, but I do like picturing the "strained resources": remove debris from your gasoline?
item.content:encoded:
I think you meant “a dearth of similar past events”, unless you meant some sort of benefit concert with a London band.

Not a typo, but I do like picturing the “strained resources”: remove debris from your gasoline?
